title: I am from Germany and do not understand the bad reviews from the Americans.
review: This movie is incredible! Brilliant Acting, intense rocket flights and a unbelievably beautiful Soundtrack. A glimpse into the life of Neil Armstrong. No hero. Never was, never will be. Just a civilian with willpower and a goal. Nothing more to say. For me its a masterpiece and I can not understand the bad review.

title: Thank you so much Russo Brothers for this emotional Masterpiece!!!
review: I dont think that anyone could have done this better than the Russo Brothers. Thank you so much for this epic ending. I have left a piece of my heart by watching this. Cant wait to watch it again. WHATEVER IT TAKES!
